name: The Dark King Demo V2
description:
This is an early access demo for an upcoming RPG for pc and android

if enough support is gained i will begin developing a diverse store and a expansive world with enough content and side missions to keep you busy

demo is up to boat as of now - A few hours of gameplay plus option to play post game

Version 2 is here updated a lot, started a basic storline on island 1, set the starting stats lower you start a 30 hp and 1 atk as oppose to the original 300hp and 40 atk

will continue on from the first island if i get enough support but until then will continue to polish and update island 1

will keep updating and keeping the game alive during development

feedback is essential

message suggestions via:https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC_Qn5Z9zs30xYAr5v...
